cas:Sofa.sofaString:
Article 1

point ( f ) of Article 1 is replaced by the following ❬‘(f ) and/or “ EPCO Steering Committee ” means the steering committee set up by the Governing Council to steer the activities of EPCO . The EPCO Steering Committee shall be composed of one member from each central bank , to be selected from among staff members at senior level with knowledge and expertise in organisational and strategic issues within their respective institutions and procurement experts . The EPCO Steering Committee shall report via the Executive Board to the Governing Council;’❭

Article 3 is amended as follows ❬in paragraph 1 , the following point ( f ) is added ⟨‘(f ) and/or support the central banks in contract management activities.’⟩ and/or the following paragraph 1a is inserted and/or ‘ 1a . EPCO shall be hosted by a central bank . The Governing Council shall appoint the hosting central bank every five years . ’ and/or paragraph 7 is replaced by the following and/or ‘ 7 . The EPCO Steering Committee shall conduct an effectiveness and efficiency evaluation of EPCO ’s activities in due course before the end of each five - year period referred to in paragraph 1a . Based on this evaluation , and taking into account the interest of other central banks in hosting EPCO , the Governing Council shall decide if it is necessary to conduct a selection procedure to choose a new hosting central bank.’❭

‘ 3 . Each year EPCO shall submit an updated procurement plan for joint tender procedures , including the names of the leading central banks , to the Governing Council for approval . The updated procurement plan submitted by EPCO may include an indication of areas in which , within specified limits , additional opportunities for joint procurement may be pursued before the next update . The Governing Council shall decide on the procurement plan and its implementation following consultation with the EPCO Steering Committee . ’
